You do not have the fee in your inventory

enchantment.spectrum.damage_proof.desc: Immunity to most forms of damage, despawning and the void

item.spectrum.upgrade_experience2.toolti: Greatly increases experience gain / decreases consumption

from any desired item onto this book

advancements.spectrum.break_decayed_bedr: Break Decayed Bedrock using a Netherite Pickaxe
advancements.spectrum.break_budding_bloc: Break a Budding Block using a Resonance Tool
advancements.spectrum.break_infested_blo: Break an Infested Block using a Resonance Tool
advancements.spectrum.break_spawner_with: Break a Mob Spawner using a Resonance Tool
advancements.spectrum.build_advanced_ped: Add new blocks to your Structure to make use of your improved Pedestal
advancements.spectrum.build_basic_pedest: To fully harness the powers of your improved Pigment Pedestal you will need to build a structure that funnels the energy from gemstones to it
advancements.spectrum.build_complex_pede: Upgrade your Pedestal structure another time fully harness it's magical powers
advancements.spectrum.carry_too_many_hea: Carry so much Crimtane with you that you get unable to jump
advancements.spectrum.carry_too_many_low: Carry so much Paltaeria with you that you are taking flight
advancements.spectrum.catch_shooting_sta: Catch a Shooting Star right out of the sky
advancements.spectrum.collect_all_basic_: Collect all 12 kinds of colorful pigment
Mixing colors seemed so easy. But then brown had to ruin your fun. Literally impossible to mix using your current palette
Collect all types of naturally generating gemstones
advancements.spectrum.collect_azurite.de: Collect Raw Azurite. It has to be refined to be more useful
advancements.spectrum.collect_neolith.de: Get Neolith Dust - You reached the end of Spectrums progression in this version, congratulations! Feel free to join Spectrums Discord to keep up to date. There is a LOT to come (also you just unlocked 2 new resources to find ;) )
advancements.spectrum.collect_gemstone_p: Crafting in the Pigment Pedestal requires Gemstone Powder. What is the most straightforward way to crush something?
advancements.spectrum.collect_grayscale_: Complete your Pigment Collection by collecting the four grayscale Pigments
advancements.spectrum.collect_lightning_: Discover the Source of Storm Stones
advancements.spectrum.collect_mermaids_g: What grows deep under the Sea?
advancements.spectrum.collect_pigment.de: Break the Leaves of a Colored Tree to get the pure Pigment you so desired. The Leaves release their precious harvest only when broken by You personally
advancements.spectrum.collect_scarlet.de: Retrieve Crimtane from the Depths of the Nether
advancements.spectrum.collect_shooting_s: Gather the precious Remnants of a Shooting Star
advancements.spectrum.collect_sparklesto: You never noticed this Ore before at all.... weird. Is there more to the world than you previously thought?
advancements.spectrum.collect_vegetal.de: Place them food, lean back and watch them devour... then break them with to harvest their drops.
advancements.spectrum.craft_bottle_of_fa: Time to tinker with your new magical abilities. Create life! Or more like... microorganisms. Weak and slow. It's something. What do they eat?
Your first experiments were successful. But there has to be more...
advancements.spectrum.craft_bottle_of_ru: It looks like there is still more. Create world-devouring decay by infusing pure crystals with the power of the void
advancements.spectrum.craft_colored_pede: Upgrade your Pigment Pedestal by using all your collected shards
advancements.spectrum.craft_colored_sapl: All around Me are Familiar Aces
Use your Magical Abilities to craft a colored sapling
advancements.spectrum.craft_moonstone_pe: Use a Moonstone Shard to upgrade your Pigment Pedestal once more
advancements.spectrum.craft_onyx_pedesta: Use the Onyx Shard to further upgrade your Pigment Pedestal
advancements.spectrum.craft_something_br: The other Side of the Rainbow
Using Onyx Powder create something truly Brown in your improved Pigment Pedestal
advancements.spectrum.craft_using_pedest: Use your Pigment Pedestal to craft an item using Gemstone Powder. It seems to react to Redstone?
Use the Fusion Shrine to create a black shard in the darkest of nights
advancements.spectrum.dark_light_staff.d: Change the Light Level of one of Radiance Staffs Lights to 1 by using the Staff on it
advancements.spectrum.use_oblivion_picka: Cut through the world using an Oblivion Pickaxe enchanted with Efficiency
advancements.spectrum.enter_dimension.de: Find out what lies beneath the bedrock floor
advancements.spectrum.fill_void_bundle.d: Completely fill up a Bottomless Bundle
advancements.spectrum.fill_void_bundle_f: Completely fill up a fully enchanted Bottomless Bundle by collecting 2000000000 items of one type
advancements.spectrum.get_player_only_gl: Craft semi-permeable glass to protect your home from intruders
advancements.spectrum.place_pedestal.des: Craft your personal Pigment Pedestal and place it down
advancements.spectrum.put_too_many_low_g: I must go, my planet needs me
Overload one of your animals with Paltaeria. Bye bye
advancements.spectrum.get_ender_treasure: Some Endermen that appear in your world carry blocks with them that seem to radiate an eerie aura
advancements.spectrum.spectrum.title: Spectrum - Start of a Journey
advancements.spectrum.spectrum.descripti: A story about magic, colors and chaos
A story about a journeys end
advancements.spectrum.spectrum_midgame.d: A story about curiosity and greed
advancements.spectrum.use_all_pedestal_u: Place an Upgrade on top of each of the four Gemstone Blocks of your Pedestal Structure
advancements.spectrum.use_end_portal_cra: I like to move it, move it
Use an End Portal Cracker on an End Portal Frame and let destruction ensue
advancements.spectrum.craft_ominous_sapl: Let it grow, let it grow!
You're sure combining Vegetal with a Young sapling will yield something interesting
advancements.spectrum.wear_complete_bedr: Wear a full suit of Bedrock Armor
advancements.spectrum.collect_ender_drag: Collect the Ender Dragons Head using a Weapon enchanted with Treasure Hunter
advancements.spectrum.collect_wither_hea: Collect a Wither Skull using a weapon enchanted with Treasure Hunter
advancements.spectrum.enter_liquid_cryst: What happens when you submerge yourself in the combination of all you have learned so far?
advancements.spectrum.gift_wet_lava_spon: Throw a Wet Lava Sponge at another player
advancements.spectrum.get_hit_while_wear: Get hit while wearing a full suit of Gemstone Armor
advancements.spectrum.collect_mob_head_u: Kill an Enemy with a Treasure Hunter enchanted Weapon and collect its Head
advancements.spectrum.build_wither_using: Build a Wither using Wither Skulls
advancements.spectrum.fill_knowledge_gem: Fill a Knowledge Gem with 10.000 Experience
advancements.spectrum.enchant_exchange_s: Create and enchant an Exchanging Staff
advancements.spectrum.get_tool_with_iner: The fastest Pick in the West
Break 500 identical Blocks using an Inertia enchanted Tool
advancements.spectrum.use_natures_staff_: Use the Natures' Staff and Vegetal on a Dead Bush to bring it back to Life
advancements.spectrum.enchant_item_worth: Use the Enchanter to enchant a single Item with Enchantments worth 2500 XP
advancements.spectrum.create_resonance_e: Use the Enchanter to create a Book with Resonance
advancements.spectrum.upgrade_enchanted_: Use the Enchanter to upgrade an Enchanted Book with Fortune III to Fortune IV
advancements.spectrum.craft_bottle_of_de: Prep yourself with a Bottle of Decay Away, just in case anything goes horribly wrong
advancements.spectrum.enchant_book.title: Lossless Compression
advancements.spectrum.enchant_book.descr: Use the Enchanter to copy the Enchantments from one or more Enchanted Books to another. It will get pricey.
advancements.spectrum.craft_and_get_25_x: Craft a Pedestal Recipe single-handedly granting you 25 XP
advancements.spectrum.finish_progression: Reach the end of your magical journey. Congratulations, Pigment Tinkerer!
Complete the Entirety of Spectrum without using any Hints. Wow! Enjoy your small Gift
advancements.spectrum.create_budding_ony: Create Budding Onyx in the Spirit Instiller. Seems like you are finally not relying on fusing them anymore!
advancements.spectrum.collect_all_shooti: Crouch-click on a Shooting Star to pick it up. Can you collect all variants?
advancements.spectrum.fill_pigment_palet: Fill up your Pigment Palette with all available Pigments
advancements.spectrum.high_jump_with_tak: Charge up a Take-Off Belt to the maximum by sneaking. Then jump!
advancements.spectrum.take_off_belt_over: Charge up a Take-Off Belt too far and lose its charge
advancements.spectrum.kill_entity_with_j: Equip a Jeopardant and deal a killing blow while having only half a heart left
advancements.spectrum.get_azure_dike_cha: Charge up a Point of Azure Dike by equipping a Trinket made out of Azurite
advancements.spectrum.high_pigment_palet: Drain a high amount of Magic from your Pigment Palette with a single action
advancements.spectrum.craft_pigment_pale: Craft a Pigment Palette to easier store the essence of your magical powers
advancements.spectrum.brew_potion_in_pot: Alchemy with a Touch of Magic
Use the Potion Workshop to brew a Potion. Add Reagents to add additional effects
advancements.spectrum.fill_potion_pendan: Use the Potion Workshop to infuse a Potion Pendant with an effect
advancements.spectrum.brew_powerful_poti: Use the Potion Workshop to brew a Potion with a level IV effect by combining Reagents
advancements.spectrum.enchant_seven_leag: Enchant your Seven League Boots with Power to become even quicker
advancements.spectrum.collect_moonstone_: Pick up Moonstone Chiseled Blocks from a Structure Deeper Down to expand your own Pedestals Structure
advancements.spectrum.craft_blacklisted_: Successfully fail to remember a Memory of a creature to powerful to be resurrected
Successfully remember a powerful creature as a Memory. You have been getting pretty good at this, haven't you?
advancements.spectrum.plant_jade_vines.d: Germinate Jade Vine Seeds and plant them on a Fence. Like all Vines, they grow downwards. Hidden away for aeons, sunlight is too bright for your plant. They only grow when exposed to the gentle moonlight
advancements.spectrum.harvest_moonstruck: Harvest Moonstruck Nectar by using a Glass Bottle on a fully grown Jade Vine
advancements.spectrum.find_ancient_ruins: In the underground you found a huge structure, guarded by a mysterious protective field
advancements.spectrum.enter_ancient_ruin: What are these mysterious signs supposed to tell you? There has to be a way to get into these structures. If not now, then later... better you keep this place in mind
advancements.spectrum.generate_ancient_r: Discover the contents of an Ancient Treasure Chest
advancements.spectrum.craft_energy_colle: Construct a collector powerful enough to harvest energy from gem geodes
advancements.spectrum.place_energy_colle: Place the collector in the center of a geode and watch it work
advancements.spectrum.place_bottle_of_fa: It's WAY more powerful than your first experiment. It seems to destroy everything it touches after a while. Is there something sturdy enough to withstand its destructive potential?
advancements.spectrum.place_bottle_of_ru: There is no going back... (for now?)
advancements.spectrum.craft_spawn_egg.de: Use the payoff of your experiments to revive an once-dead creature
